last_episode_to_air.name: Even More Scientists
last_episode_to_air.overview: From a skate park designer to a pastry chef, these real-life heroes with super-cool jobs put science to work every day!

name: Ada Twist, Scientist
overview: Pint-sized scientist Ada Twist and her two best friends are asking big questions — and working together to discover the truth about everything!

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Ada and her science-loving friends are searching high and low for answers this season, from the sky above to the earth below and everywhere in between!

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Learning is always an adventure with Ada, Iggy and Rosie — and curiosity, imagination and discovery are at the heart of every question they ask!

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Ada, Iggy and Rosie add a new friend to the science squad this season: technology whiz-kid Benny B. He's got great ideas — and a super-cool robot dog!

tagline: She's got the formula for fun!

episodes.name: A Fort of One's Own
episodes.overview: Ada and friends brainstorm ways to unlock the door to her brother's backyard fort.

episodes.name: Twelve Angry Birds
episodes.overview: The kids use the scientific method to prove Mooshu Kitty's innocence.

episodes.name: Movie Night
episodes.overview: A power outage zaps Ada's plans for the "perfect" movie night.

episodes.name: The Banana Peel Problem
episodes.overview: Rosie’s Great Aunt Rose is coming, and she loves banana bread — time to get peeling!

episodes.name: Cake Twist
episodes.overview: The friends whip up a tasty solution when Mom Twist forgets her anniversary.

episodes.name: Garden Party
episodes.overview: Ada, Rosie and Iggy work together to revive the Pecks' wilted garden.

episodes.name: Bird's Eye View
episodes.overview: The kids examine what a bird's nest is made of so they can build a new one.

episodes.name: Sleeping Duty
episodes.overview: Ada and pals invent a gizmo to help an exhausted Arthur get more sleep.

episodes.name: Sight of Music
episodes.overview: The power of observation helps Rosie and the gang tune an old piano for a living room recital.

episodes.name: Rain Day
episodes.overview: Rain forces the kids to rethink their outdoor party plans.

episodes.name: The Great Stink
episodes.overview: Ada and friends follow their noses and discover the source of a bad smell: Arthur’s tennis shoes!

episodes.name: Rosie's Rockin' Pet
episodes.overview: Taking a "brain break" helps the kids solve a problem.

episodes.name: The Curious Case of Lil' Liz
episodes.overview: It's science to the rescue when Arthur's pet lizard goes missing.

episodes.name: Cat on a Hot Twist Roof
episodes.overview: The kids work together to get Mooshu — and Arthur's toy helicopter — down off the roof.

episodes.name: Ada Twist Magicianist
episodes.overview: Ink disappears right before Ada's eyes, but was it magic... or science?

episodes.name: Bend It Like Arthur
episodes.overview: The friends help Arthur figure out why he can’t score a goal in soccer.

episodes.name: Oh Parachute
episodes.overview: Ada and company construct a parachute, using eggs as crash-test dummies.

episodes.name: Meltdown
episodes.overview: The kids learn to pivot when their plans to build a snow fort don't pan out.

episodes.name: Show Me the Bunny
episodes.overview: When Arthur claims the Twist Family Egg Hunt is too easy for him, Ada vows to make it egg-stra challenging.

episodes.name: A Kite Above the Rest
episodes.overview: Iggy’s on a mission to make his kite fly.

episodes.name: Skate On
episodes.overview: Iggy designed an awesome skate park but has more fun watching his friends enjoy it.

episodes.name: Ada's Cure for the Common Conundrum
episodes.overview: The kids build a high-tech nurse bot to help Mom Twist fight the flu.

episodes.name: Mind Over Muscle
episodes.overview: Rosie's convinced she needs bigger muscles to karate chop her way through a wooden board.

episodes.name: Iggy Gettin' Diggy With It
episodes.overview: The kids make a metal detector to find a missing time capsule.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Ada and her science-loving friends are searching high and low for answers this season, from the sky above to the earth below and everywhere in between!

episodes.name: Ready, Set, Rosie
episodes.overview: Rosie wants to win the Raucous Riveters Reunion Race — but something's wrong with her car!

episodes.name: A Wheel with a Twist
episodes.overview: The gang reinvents a toy for Ada's cousin, who has autism.

episodes.name: The Whiz Kid Quiz
episodes.overview: Ada and Rosie make a public speaking potion to help boost Iggy's confidence.

episodes.name: Glitter-tastrophe
episodes.overview: To get glitter off the rug, the team turns a negative into a positive.

episodes.name: DadBot
episodes.overview: Ada builds a DadBot to make Mom's life easier around the house.

episodes.name: Into the Brainstorm
episodes.overview: The friends learn all about thunderstorms to help Rosie feel less afraid of them.

episodes.name: Ice Creamed
episodes.overview: Iggy designs a bridge to help a stranded Arthur cross the creek for Free Ice Cream Day.

episodes.name: Pitch Perfect
episodes.overview: Tents are on the agenda when the Twists take everyone camping.

episodes.name: Slow Your Roll
episodes.overview: Ada tries to get her parents' old roller skates back into shape.

episodes.name: The Amazing-Spider Twist
episodes.overview: The kids use their heads — and noses — to keep Ada's pet spider out of the house.

episodes.name: Ghost Busted
episodes.overview: A creeped-out Iggy's convinced there's a ghost in his basement.

episodes.name: A Cold-Blooded Complication
episodes.overview: The team tests different materials to keep Lil' Liz and her terrarium warm.

episodes.name: The Giggle Bug
episodes.overview: Laughter's the best medicine... but is it contagious?

episodes.name: Dance Dance Twist Solution
episodes.overview: Ada hopes muscle memory can help her ace her dance moves for an upcoming recital.

episodes.name: Bee the Change
episodes.overview: The Science Scouts build a hotel to bring bees back to the park.

episodes.name: Battle of the Boogie Bots
episodes.overview: Ada's so worried about making the perfect prototype that she can't stop sleep-working.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Learning is always an adventure with Ada, Iggy and Rosie — and curiosity, imagination and discovery are at the heart of every question they ask!

episodes.name: Benny Who
episodes.overview: When a new family moves to town, the team meets Benny, a sci-fi loving kid who misses his old life and wants to find a way to get back home

episodes.name: My Messy Valentine
episodes.overview: Rosie built a special Valentine's Day catapult called "The Love Launcher," but it isn't working the way she'd hoped. Time to get organized and fix it!

episodes.name: The Green Team
episodes.overview: Ada and the gang take Arthur on an out-of-this-world adventure to convince him that caring about Earth is cool — and really important!

episodes.name: The Right Puff
episodes.overview: It's science to the rescue when Ada has a hair emergency on the day of Grandma and Pop-Pop's golden anniversary. Can she get her signature curls back?

episodes.name: Monster Mash
episodes.overview: While playing Goblins & Dragons with Arthur, Benny accidentally breaks a rare figurine, sending the kids on a science-fueled side quest to replace it.

episodes.name: Soakchella
episodes.overview: When the town's annual water battle is canceled due to drought, the Green Team works together to find a more sustainable way to have fun.

episodes.name: Mixtape Remix
episodes.overview: Benny's planning a special gift for his dad's birthday that involves a mixtape, magnets — and bringing his mom's amazing music back to life.

episodes.name: Rodeo Rosie
episodes.overview: To win the Silver Saddle trophy, Rosie must balance on a bucking bull for 8 whole seconds — just like her mom and Great Aunt Rose. Can physics help?

episodes.name: Dad to the Bone
episodes.overview: The grown-ups are making a racket while practicing for the Last Band Standing competition. Can the kids solve the problem with science?

episodes.name: X Marks the Spot
episodes.overview: The friends hunt for treasure inside a dark cave, where their pal Pepper teaches them about echolocation — and shows them there's another way to "see."

episodes.name: Blue River Wedding
episodes.overview: When a tornado touches down on the day of Sensei Dave and Jiu Jitsu Joe's wedding, the gang must think up a way for all of the guests to safely gather.

episodes.name: A Twist in Time
episodes.overview: Ada goes looking for a wormhole so she can travel back in time and fix an embarrassing mistake. But what if she never finds one?

episodes.name: Old Mr. Oak
episodes.overview: The Green Team stands up for a beloved oak tree when Principal Rahul announces plans to chop it down to make room for a brand-new swing set.

episodes.name: You Got Served
episodes.overview: Ada and the team serve up smart ideas to help Arthur tackle a tough tennis opponent. But the biggest win of all? Convincing him to keep an open mind!

episodes.name: The Garbage Gobbler
episodes.overview: While investigating a "monster" at the creek, the kids discover something even scarier: tons of yucky trash! Can they build a machine to clean it all up?

episodes.name: Planet Hunters
episodes.overview: NASA thinks there might be a ninth planet on the edge of our solar system, and Ada and her friends are determined to help them find it!

episodes.name: Iggy's Memory Palace
episodes.overview: Iggy promised Bee-Bee he'd build her a tea party palace for a playdate with new friends. But there's a problem: He can't remember where his plans are!

episodes.name: Dinnertime Deadline
episodes.overview: The Science Scouts pitch in to help Mom Twist make pizzas for the Community Kitchen. But when the power goes out, how will they feed folks in need?

episodes.name: Getting It Write
episodes.overview: A high-tech AI bot built to help Ada craft the perfect story for a kids writing contest can't compete with human creativity... or can it?

episodes.name: More Scientists
episodes.overview: Meet real-life scientists who know their stuff, from a contraptionist who builds sturdy bridges to a zoo archaeologist who studies animals from the past.

episodes.name: Even More Scientists
episodes.overview: From a skate park designer to a pastry chef, these real-life heroes with super-cool jobs put science to work every day!

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Ada, Iggy and Rosie add a new friend to the science squad this season: technology whiz-kid Benny B. He's got great ideas — and a super-cool robot dog!
